name: Pipe Puzzle (itch)
description:
This is a clone of the classic game "Pipe Dream", playable on a touchscreen although it's a bit small. Uses Pixi.JS for WebGL rendering, and my prototype game engine Muffin Game.

This game is open source and permissively licensed, so you can do anything you want with this code. Graphics are from OpenGameArt. The pipes are edited from art by TwistedDonkey. The explosion was created by Sogomn.
